items.question: What amenities are included in my apartment rental in the building?
items.answer: The Cristina offers a variety of high-end amenities, including a fully equipped gym, yoga studio, games lounge, communal garden, built-in home offices, lobby, courtyard, gazebo, parcel locker, heated underground parking and storage lockers. This Smiths Falls apartment amenities are designed to enhance your living experience and build a sense of community.

items.question: Is the building smoke free?
items.answer: Yes, all of our buildings are entirely smoke free.

items.question: Are pets allowed?

items.question: How do I schedule a tour of the apartments?
items.answer: To schedule a tour of our apartments in Smiths Falls, contact us by [contact form](#contact), phone or [email](mailto:leasing@lepineapartments.com). Our team will happily show you around the property and help you find your new rental apartment in Smiths Falls.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Yes, indoor heated parking and outdoor parking is available for an extra cost per month.

items.question: Do you offer furnished apartments?
items.answer: We currently do not offer furnished suites.

items.question: Do the apartments come with private outdoor space?
items.answer: Select suites come with a private outdoor terrace or balcony.

items.question: Are utilities included in the apartment rental?
items.answer: Utilities are an extra monthly cost and are metered separately for your convenience.

items.question: Are the apartments air conditioned?
items.answer: Yes, all suites offer individual climate-controlled heat pumps.

items.question: What types of apartments are available at The Cristina?
items.answer: At Cristina, we offer a variety of [spacious 1-bedroom](https://lepineapartments.com/newsroom/bungalow-sized-apartments) and 2-bedroom apartments, with the option of a built-in home office. These Smiths Falls apartment rentals are designed to suit your lifestyle needs. Each suite has modern finishes and open layouts to create a comfortable, spacious living space.

items.question: How do I schedule a tour of the apartment?
items.answer: To schedule a tour of our Smiths Falls apartment rentals, simply fill out our [contact form](#contact), give us a call or [send us an email](mailto:leasing@lepineapartments.com).

items.question: What is the application process like to rent an apartment?
items.answer: The application process is simple! Simply give us a call and we can either walk you through it or send you a lease application form for your apartment rental in Smiths Falls.

items.question: What is the lease term?
items.answer: The minimum lease term for our apartment rentals is 12 months but many of our residents sign multi-year leases. For more details or customized lease options, please [contact our leasing office](#contact).

items.question: What is there to do in Smiths Falls?
items.answer: Smiths Falls has something for everyone, from outdoor adventures like hiking, fishing and boating along the Rideau River to community events, local dining and shopping.

items.question: Is Smiths Falls a walkable town?
items.answer: Yes, Smiths Falls is a walkable town with a compact downtown area, parks, restaurants and stores easily accessible on foot.

items.question: Is Smiths Falls an excellent place to raise a family?
items.answer: Absolutely. Smiths Falls is known for its family-friendly atmosphere, with safe neighbourhoods, excellent schools and plenty of parks and community events.

items.question: What is near The Cristina?
items.answer: The Cristina is conveniently located near a ton of great amenities, including grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops and healthcare facilities. Nearby parks and schools add further convenience, making it an ideal location for both relaxation and daily living.
